duties_responsibilities.duty: Write user stories and manage technical product/program ownership with a focus on Sales Application platform and business automation.
Utilize experience with Rally/Jira to understand and automate business processes.
Work with a technical background to coordinate with development teams and bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Utilize UI/UX background to enhance the client experience and automate business processes.
Leverage previous client experience as a Contractor or working with Big Tech companies to bring valuable perspective and insights to the role.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a technical field (Master's preferred)
